titles.title: Recognizing the Reserve Forces Policy Board on its 50th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 9/19/2002--Introduced. Commends the Reserve Forces Policy Board (created by the Armed Forces Reserve Act of 1952 (Public Law 82-476)) on its 50th anniversary and for its fine work as an independent source of advice to the Secretary of Defense on matters pertaining to the Reserve components of the Armed Forces.
